name: 2619T8 Times City Apartment
address: Unit 2619, T8 Building, Times City, 458 Minh Khai, Hai Ba Trung district, Hoang Mai District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set 2.2 km from Hanoi Creative City in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment features a garden with an outdoor pool and a year-round outdoor pool. The unit is 3.6 km from National Museum of Vietnamese History. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

There is a seating area, a dining area and a kitchen equipped with an oven. A flat-screen TV is offered. Other facilities at 2619T8 Times City Apartment include a seasonal outdoor pool.

You can play tennis and table tennis at the property, and car hire is available. Ba Dinh Square is 3.7 km from 2619T8 Times City Apartment, while Hanoi Opera House is 3.7 km from the property. Noi Bai International Airport is 26 km away.
